attributes.action: Demand that the government treat our brave injured service personel in a fairer & more dignified manner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government treat prisoners & imigrants to a better standard of living than our injured military personel.  The compensation they recieve for sometimes horrific injuries is far less than a secretary is awarded for RSI or for a case of sexual or racial discrimination.  It is about time we treated our service personel with the dignity & respect they deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
